subTitle: Web developper & designer
aboutMe-citation: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
aboutMe-first-bloc: Hello and welcome to my site, I am Abstrakts. Passionate from a young age by technology and more mainly I quickly told myself that there are many possibilities, almost infinite in terms of development.
aboutMe-second-bloc: This is why I first undertook design studies, having an eye for the graphic arts. To then undertake a long road towards learning web development (One not without the other in my opinion). Meticulous, passionate and attentive, I can support you in your various projects.

first.title: MyReptileScan
first.description: Managing mobile app from reptiles farmers.

second.title: Sharespace
second.description: Social network application aimed at raising awareness of the well-beig of the planet.

third.title: CashMachin
third.description: Specialized cash register application for nail technicians

first.title: UX / UI
first.citation: The essence of a project is the perfect harmony between the aesthetic, the useful and the fair.
first.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
first.col_1: Graphic designer and web designer for more than 7 years now, the basics of UX and UI are no longer a secret to me.
first.col_2: By carrying out your project, I will make sure that the users of your site are pleasantly surprised by the ease of navigation through your pages.

second.title: Web development
second.citation: It seems that perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing more to take away.
second.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry
second.col_1: Whether it's your portfolio, your presentation site or your e-commerce, ...
second.col_2: I will accompany you in every detail of your project in order to provide you with a site and a successful experience.

third.title: Mobile development
third.citation: Any code you've been writing for 6 months or more without looking at it might as well have been written by someone else.
third.author: Alan Eagleson
third.col_1: Do you need to create a mobile application to manage your business more easily or for any project?
third.col_2: Do not hesitate any longer, the mobile experience is constantly expanding, I can adapt to all your requests.

forth.title: Graphic identity
forth.citation: Computer science education cannot make anyone an expert programmer any more than the study of brushes and pigment can make someone an expert painter.
forth.author: Eric S. Raymond
forth.col_1: Are you opening a new business or do you simply want to change the graphic identity of your activity?
forth.col_2: Business card, logos, signs, etc ... My expertise will be entirely at your service.

bannerContent: Contact me by clicking the button below, I would be happy to discuss it with you!
